text: Congo is a 1995 science fiction action-adventure film loosely based on  Michael Crichton's novel of the same name. It was directed by Frank Marshall. It stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh, Ernie Hudson, Tim Curry, Grant Heslov and Joe Don Baker. The film was released on June 9, 1995, by Paramount Pictures.  Congo received negative reviews but performed better than Paramount expected.
